name: dispersedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is spread across a large area: There were a lot of people standing dispersedly in little groups. In the northern region, most of the rural population lives dispersedly, not in compact villages.
More examplesFewer examplesThe molecules are not deposited dispersedly but as molecular clusters.The study investigates the possibility of purifying dispersedly distributed wastewater.A number of white crystals were dispersedly scattered on the surface.Some of the company's employees collaborate locally while others work dispersedly.
